definitions.definition: To make something harmful, especially by the addition of some unwanted product.
definitions.example: The factory polluted the river when it cleaned its tanks.

definitions.definition: To make something or somewhere less suitable for some activity, especially by the introduction of some unnatural factor.
definitions.example: The lights from the stadium polluted the night sky, and we couldn't see the stars.

definitions.definition: To violate sexually; to debauch; to dishonour.
